1000: Birth Certificate requires: Parent's Identity Proof, Parent's Address Proof, Birth Proof, Parent's Marriage Certificate
1001: Death Certificate requires: Death Certificate, Identity Proof, Address Proof
1002: Income Certificate requires: Salary Slip, Income Proof, Identity Proof, Address Proof, Bank Statement, Age Proof
1003: Domicile Certificate requires: School Leaving Certificate, Identity Proof, Aadhaar Card, Residence Proof
1004: Caste Certificate requires: Address Proof, Domicile Proof, Identity Proof, Caste Proof
1005: Agricultural Certificate requires: Land Ownership Proof, Identity Proof, Address Proof
1006: Non- Creamy Layer requires: Caste Proof, Income Proof, Identity Proof, Address Proof
1007: Property Documents requires: Property Ownership Proof, Identity Proof
1008: Marriage Certificates requires: Address Proof, Aadhaar Proof, Marriage Declaration, Wedding Invitation Proof
1009: Senior Citizen Certificate requires: Aadhaar Card, Age Proof
1010: Solvency Certificate requires: Bank Statements, Property Documents
1011: Shop and Establishment Registration requires: Rent Agreement, Aadhaar Card, Electricity Bill
1012: Contract Labour License requires: Proof of Business, Employer Details, Aadhaar Card
1013: Factory Registration Certificate requires: Proof of Ownership, Factory Layout Plan, Aadhaar Card
1014: Boiler Registration Certificate requires: Manufacturer Approval, Technical Specification, Aadhaar Card
1015: Landless Certificate requires: Revenue Records, Aadhaar Card
1016: New Water Connection requires: Proof of Land Ownership, Aadhaar Card
